item.title: Tiny tech library in Písek
item.description:
Contact First, check that the book is available in the table below. Then shoot me an email to balazs@kutilovi.cz with the name of the book, ideally a day in advance. Books can be picked up and returned on Mondays. 3-5 p.m, Smetanova 78⁄1, Písek. My office doesn’t have a doorbell, so call me at +420 774 788 228 when you arrive and I’ll navigate you around.
Terms You can borrow the book for a month.
